title.rendered: Bhuvaneshwar Kumar & Vijay Shankar Injury updates

content.rendered:
Three player are listed in injury

All Indian cricket fans and fantasy cricket players are ardent in knowing the injury status of pacer Bhuvaneshwar Kumar. Earlier to this Shikar Dhawan left-hand opening batsman had a thumb fracture and was ruled out of World Cup 2019.  Vijay Shankar joined the list while in net practice Bumrah had bowled a yorker and that hit toes.

Indian physio observing closely on injured players

Now the latest news is that both Vijay Shankar and Bhuvaneshwar Kumar were seen in the nets with physio Patrick Farhart ahead of Afghanistan match on the 22-June-2019. Both had light drills and Bhuvanesh was seen running at a slow pace and Patrick Farhart physio was closely observing them know about their condition. Vijay and Bhuvanesh were also having multiple discussions between their sessions.

The latest news on the players

Sooner or later, the status of both are expected to be revealed by the officials and the exact status will be known. Bhuvaneshwar, a senior bowler and his presence for the game is important for India.

NOTE: Try fantasy cricket and know your cricket skills

5 / 5 ( 1 vote )
